recommendationDetails:
1. In term of personal Feng Shui, this sector is your growth and wisdom direction. It is advisable to work and study in this location because it will help you think more clearly. 
2. Place a laughing buddha with dragon headed turtle in North to symbolize protection and stability.

1. Minimize major activities in this sector as it might cause poor financial luck so avoid making important business call in this sector 
2. It is also the sector that attract illness so avoid sleeping in this sector. Display metal Wulu in this area to mitigate the negative effects.

1. Avoid sleeping with your head facing this direction. 
2. Don't face this direction at work. 
3. Beware of Disputes and Legal Matter if you main door is in this sector.

- It is ideally to sleep with your head in this direction and even better if you can situate your bedroom in the west of your home. 
- Hang brass wulu with 5 emperor coins in the this sector for better health and longevity.

1. Avoid facing this direction when working. 
2. Do not activate this area with water feature or other enhancer. 
3. Minimize activities in this sector

1. To attract love and romance, place a pair of Mandarin Ducks in this sector 
2. Display Peony flowers or a vase full of real peony flowers to enhance your romance luck.

1. Face this direction for all important activities. 
2. if your main door is facing Northeast, it can attract money and success luck 
3. Always keep this area clutter -less 
4. Displaying auspicious symbols in this direction enhances wealth and prosperity luck.

1. If possible, avoid this direction by all means as this is your total loss/ misfortune direction. 
2. Avoid or minimize any activities in this sector
